description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b11tv","text":"This paper presents an approach to studying rangeland degradation by integrating remote sensing data, geographic information systems, and ecological niche theory. The document provides information about the source data used in writing the manuscript.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
